description.name: dogebep20
description.tagline: Dogecoin bep20 Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto bep20-doge Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept Dogecoin bep20 directly on your website
Unique bep20/doge receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your bep20/doge wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
